alert.note: Alert for Christian; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 03 at 4:26PM CST until January 03 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Christian County in central Illinois... East central Sangamon County in central Illinois... * Until 500 PM CST. * At 425 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Edinburg, or 12 miles southeast of Springfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Edinburg around 435 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Mechanicsburg and Mount Auburn. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
